name: Up High
description:
You wake up in your apartment... everyone left... accept you... why? Suddenly noise followed by a huge eye... thats why everyone left! Your only objective now is to run, to get out of the building as fast as possible. But only one problem: He's looking at you!

Controlls:

ActionKeyboard/MouseControllerWalkingWASDLeft-JoystickCameraMouseRight-JoystickCamera ZoomMouse-wheelTrigger-left/rightPicking up key/opening doorEA (XBOX)
B (SWICTH)Pause GameEsc/EnterStart

Controller Recommended, tho you can't navigate without a mouse in the UI.
